content.question: Sentiments such as those expressed in the excerpt contributed most directly to which of the following developments?

choices.label: Limitations on local governmentsâ€™ ability to regulate businesses
Passage of legislation expanding political power to citizens
Elimination of legal and social segregation in northern cities
Strengthening of political machines in major urban areas

content.answer: Passage of legislation expanding political power to citizens

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
